titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide for the testing of motor vehicles at high altitudes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 6/14/1988--Introduced. Amends the Clean Air Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish, within 180 days of this Act's enactment, at least one high altitude site for testing motor vehicles and engines for conformity with emission and fuel standards.
